00041 /*
00042  * NOTE: during quick performance tests on a sun ultra and an alpha
00043  * 255 300, the md5 libraries performed upwards of 3mb/sec.  That
00044  * included disk i/o on bobcat and panther.
00045  */

00061 typedef unsigned int            md5_uint32;
00062 #define MAX_MD5_UINT32          ((md5_uint32)4294967295U)
00063 
00068 #define MD5_BLOCK_SIZE          64
00069 
00073 typedef struct
00074 {
00075   md5_uint32    md_A;                   /* accumulater 1 */
00076   md5_uint32    md_B;                   /* accumulater 2 */
00077   md5_uint32    md_C;                   /* accumulater 3 */
00078   md5_uint32    md_D;                   /* accumulater 4 */
00079 
00080   md5_uint32    md_total[2];            /* totaling storage */
00081   md5_uint32    md_buf_len;             /* length of the storage buffer */
00082   char          md_buffer[MD5_BLOCK_SIZE * 2];  /* character storage buffer */
00083 } md5_t;
